3rd International Conference on Fluid Flow,
Heat and Mass Transfer (FFHMT'16)

May 2016 | Ottawa, ON

Paper Submissions

Registration

Search:

Announcements

1

FFHMT 2016:

FFHMT 2016 will be held in Ottawa, Canada on May 2016.

2

Poster Board Dimensions:

Authors presenting via poster boards are to be informed that poster boards are 130 cm height and 95 cm width.

3

Best Paper Award:

Two best paper awards will be conferred to author(s) of the papers that receive the highest rank during the peer-review and by the respected session chairs. Please visit Paper Submission for more information.

The registration fees for the International Conference on Fluid Flow, Heat and Mass Transfer 2015 are listed below. All prices are in CAD and subjected to 13% HST (Harmonized Sales Tax):

Early Bird Registration
Prior to March 1 2015		 Students*: 400.00 + 13% HST = 452.00
Non-Students: 600.00 + 13% HST = 678.00
Regular Registration
Prior to April 1 2015		 Students: 450.00 + 13% HST = 508.50
Non-Students: 700.00 + 13% HST = 791.00
Late Registration
After April 1 2015		 Students: 500.00 + 13% HST = 565.00
Non-Students: 800.00 + 13% HST = 904.00

* Student Identification will be Required on Registration Desk.
Please note that registration fees are not refundable under any circumstances.

Registration fee includes the following:

  • Publication of 1 accepted paper in the proceedings. Publication of each additional paper requires a $100 publication fee for a maximum of 2 additional papers
  • Conference package including a USB of the proceedings with all registered accepted papers
  • Buffet lunch for each day of the conference
  • 2 coffee breaks for each day of the conference

Important information for participants who need to apply for VISA.
Please refer to the attachment document(s) for information pretaining to VISA. International ASET Inc. still suggests that you address any questions or concerns with your local Canadian Embassy:


English VISA Information

Information de votre VISA

New VISA Information

Credit Card / PayPal

After the registration fee is paid, you must fill out and submit the form below. Failing to fill out this form will result in the elimination of your registration. Please ensure that you follow the instructions carefully to warrant a successful registration.

Please note: If the registration has been done on behalf of another person, the person attending the conference should fill out this form.
